Translations.Text: Inna Feraun: "awit iyi d yal aseeear amusnaw
Mi d usan iseeearen, inna yasen Musa: "veggoet ara tveggoem
Mi veggoen, inna Musa: "ayen d tebbwim d sseur. S tidep, a t Inqev Oebbi". Ih, Oebbi ur Issewqam ara igiten ifessaden
Oebbi Itebbit tidep, s wawal iS, xas ugin ibe$wviyen
I iumnen s Musa, siwa tarwa seg ugdud is, ilmend n tugdi uhewwel n Feraun akked imvebboen is. Ih, Feraun d abe$wvi di tmurt. Neppa, s tidep, seg imaafan
Inna Musa: "a yagdud iw! Ma teppamnem s Oebbi, ppeklet fellaS ma d imvuaen ay tellam
Nnan: "neppkel $ef Oebbi. A Mass nne$, ur a$ ppara d ahewwel i ugdud imednas
Sellek a$, s ueunu K, seg ugdud ijehliyen
Nweeea i Musa akked gma s: "ebnut ixxamen i ugdud nnwen di Maueo, erret ixxamen nnwen ar lqibla, beddet i teallit. Becceo lmumnin

Inna Musa: "a Mass nne$! S tidep, Tefkiv i Feraun akked imvebboen is, ooeue akked wayla di tmeddurt n ddunit, a Mass nne$, iwakken ad nnetlafen seg ubrid iK. A Mass nne$, Squcc ayla nnsen, S$eo ulawen nnsen, ur ppamnen alamma walan aaaqeb aqeoean
